{{ shebang }}

# Generated script to execute the mongoimport utility program 
# using the json data generated by this project; see the two
# 'generate-baseball-data' scripts.
#
# Generated at: {{ generated_at }} 
#
# Chris Joakim, Microsoft, May 2022

echo ''
echo 'executing mongoimport to collection: {{ coll }} in database: {{ db }} ...' 

mongoimport \
    --uri {{ uri }} \
    --db {{ db }} \
    --collection {{ coll }} \
    --file {{ file }} \
    --numInsertionWorkers {{ nworkers }} \
    --batchSize {{ batch_size }} \
    --mode {{ mode }} \
    --writeConcern "{w:0}" {{ ssl_flag }}

echo 'mongoimport completed'
